attributes.additional_details: It is a reasonable reward for people who have risked their lives for other people
attributes.background: Give key workers  a thank you

rejection.details:
Many public sector employees already have the option of taking their sector-specific pension early, including the NHS, police forces, and fire fighters. 

You might also like to sign one or more of the following petitions which call for changes to the state pension age:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304996
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302965
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321269
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319691
